description:
Tenders are invited for the items detailed in the bid solicitation document.

Subject to the approved budget and all relevant authorities, the DND intends to contract with a supplier for 1200 units of battery non-rechargeable.

\
full_summary:
```
# Government Tender Announcement
## Battery, Non-Rechargeable

### Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01029858
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-237611/A
* **Publication Date**: March 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 11, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: March 29, 2023
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Tender Notice

The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the procurement of non-rechargeable batteries. The tender includes four items with varying quantities and delivery locations.

* **Item 1**: GSIN: 6135, NSN: 20-002-4848, Battery, Non-Rechargeable; Part No.: OR0971, NCAGE: 18560; Quantity: 400; Unit of Issue: EA; Delivery Location: CFSD Montreal; Delivery Date: May 30, 2023
* **Item 2**: GSIN: 6135, NSN: 20-002-4848, Battery, Non-Rechargeable; Part No.: OR0971, NCAGE: 18560; Quantity: 200; Unit of Issue: EA; Delivery Location: CFSD Edmonton; Delivery Date: May 30, 2023
* **Item 3**: GSIN: 6135, NSN: 20-002-4848, Battery, Non-Rechargeable; Part No.: OR0971, NCAGE: 18560; Quantity: 400; Unit of Issue: EA; Delivery Location: CFSD Montreal; Delivery Date: May 30, 2024
* **Item 4**: GSIN: 6135, NSN: 20-002-4848, Battery, Non-Rechargeable; Part No.: OR0971
